name: Hydro Flask
description: A durable stainless steel bottle with double-wall insulation, keeping drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Leak-proof and easy to carry, perfect for outdoor adventures, gym, and daily use.

name: Smart Bottle
description: A Bluetooth-connected bottle that tracks hydration and reminds you to drink. Made from premium stainless steel, keeping drinks at the perfect temperature. Ideal for fitness, office, and tech-savvy users.

name: Steel Sip
description: A stainless steel, insulated bottle with a rugged design for everyday use, travel, and work. The easy-pour spout and sturdy handle make it perfect for students, families, and outdoor enthusiasts.

name: Eco Bottle
description: A minimalist, eco-friendly water bottle made from glass or biodegradable materials, featuring a cork lid. Ideal for home, office, or casual outings while reducing plastic waste.

name: Sport Flow
description: A lightweight, ergonomic sports bottle designed for athletes, gym-goers, and outdoor activities. Features a leak-proof flip lid for easy access and secure hydration during workouts.

name: Pure Drink
description: A BPA-free squeeze bottle designed for cyclists, runners, and sports enthusiasts. Lightweight and easy to grip, allowing for quick hydration during workouts or training.

name: Aqua Boost
description: A fruit-infuser water bottle, perfect for those who enjoy flavored hydration. Features a removable infuser core, a leak-proof design, and durable borosilicate glass or BPA-free plastic.

name: Arctic Chill
description: A high-performance insulated bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. The non-slip grip and leak-proof lid make it ideal for travel, work, and workouts.

name: Terra Flask
description: A sustainable, stylish bottle featuring a natural bamboo lid and eco-friendly glass or biodegradable material. Ideal for office use, casual outings, and mindful hydration.

name: Titan Jug
description: A large-capacity sports jug built for long workouts, hikes, and outdoor activities. Features a sturdy handle, shatter-resistant body, and leak-proof cap.

name: Urban Squeeze
description: A soft, squeezable sports bottle designed for quick hydration. Made from BPA-free plastic, featuring a spill-proof valve and ergonomic grip, ideal for cycling, running, and gym workouts.

name: Zen Flow
description: A sleek, minimalist water bottle designed for yoga lovers and mindfulness practitioners. Made from glass or BPA-free plastic, featuring a soft silicone grip and spill-proof dispenser cap.

name: Tiny Sip
description: A BPA-free, food-grade silicone baby bottle with an anti-colic vent system to reduce gas discomfort. The soft spout supports an easy transition from breastfeeding.

name: Kiddie Flow
description: A fun, leak-proof kids' bottle with a flip-top straw lid for easy drinking. Lightweight and spill-resistant, ideal for school, playmates, and active kids.

name: Dino Gulp
description: A stainless steel, insulated kids' bottle featuring dinosaur prints. Keeps drinks cold for up to 12 hours with a flip cap straw for easy sipping.

name: Magic Squeeze (3-Pack)
description: A set of three soft silicone sippy cups with built-in straws and spill-proof valves. Designed for toddlers learning to drink independently.
